channel.title: [Help] TopSkills [Help]
channel.description:
I want to make it so it shows the highest rank from each skill listed in a PHP file. I have done the HighScores tutorial of Deathschaos9.
I don't have the new HighScores Jagex one, I have the old one which is better.
I would like to know how to get the name and the level in there like this for example:
Overall: playerName(lvl) Attack: playerName(lvl)
Thanks if you can help me. I would really like to learn with this. Add my MSN if you wanna help me: Ineedhelpfrugooscape@Hotmail.com
